name: stringified-handler
description: A super simple approach to SSR events handling through object literals.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:babel && npm run min && npm run fix:default && npm run test && npm run size
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.rollup:babel: rollup --config rollup/babel.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck && drop-babel-typeof index.js
scripts.fix:default: sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' index.js && sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' es.js && sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' min.js
scripts.size: cat min.js | brotli | wc -c && cat es.js | brotli | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
